name: windows-sdks
description: Windows SDK and BuildTools utilities for Node.js native addon development

scripts.build: npm run build-x64 && npm run build-arm64
scripts.build-copy-only: npm run copy-x64 && npm run copy-arm64
scripts.copy-x64: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = '../winsdk-CLI/Winsdk.Cli/bin/Release/net9.0/win-x64/publish'; const dest = 'bin/win-x64'; fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true});"
scripts.copy-arm64: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = '../winsdk-CLI/Winsdk.Cli/bin/Release/net9.0/win-arm64/publish'; const dest = 'bin/win-arm64'; fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.cpSync(src, dest, {recursive: true});"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\\nðŸŽ‰ Windows SDK utilities installed successfully!\\n\\nGet started with: npx winsdk --help\\n')"

author: Nikola Metulev
